title: Explorer Woman Ray
synopsis: She's an archeologist AND a black belt and Ray Kazuki will need her brains and her brawn as she plunges into a thrill-filled adventure. Ray's examining an exciting new archeological discovery: a legendary temple located in an isolated area of the world.
voices: ['Takayama, Minami', 'Itou, Miki', 'Hori, Katsunosuke', 'Doi, Mika', 'Koseki, Hajime', 'Genda, Tesshou']
staff: [['Hayashi, Hiroki', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Layout']], ['Fujiyama, Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Yamanaka, Norimasa', ['Theme Song Arrangement', ' Theme Song Composition', ' Music']], ['Iso, Mitsuo', ['Key Animation']]]
